properties.name: opa.filter.enabled
properties.description: Enable security based on OPA web filter

properties.name: opa.filter.documentPath
properties.description: Name of OPA policy path to use for queries (eg. this/is/path/to/policy)

properties.name: opa.filter.instance
properties.description: URL to OPA server, containing protocol, and port (eg. http://localhost:8181)

properties.name: opa.filter.endpointsWhitelist
properties.description: Comma-separated list of ant patterns to use for matching whitelisted endpoints (eg. /ping,/health,/info,/api-docs/**)
